title: Comparing Online Solvers for Handwritten Digit Classification
description: In this lab, we will compare the performance of different online solvers for the classification of handwritten digits. We will be using the scikit-learn library to load and preprocess the data, as well as to train and test the classifiers. The goal is to observe how different solvers perform under different proportions of training data.

meta.title: Handwritten Digit Classification | Performance Comparison | Online Solvers
meta.description: Explore the performance of different online solvers for handwritten digit classification using the scikit-learn library. Preprocess data and observe solver performance with varying training data proportions.
meta.keywords: handwritten digit classification, online solvers, scikit-learn, data preprocessing, performance comparison

i18n.title: 手写数字分类的在线求解器比较
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将比较不同在线求解器对手写数字分类的性能。我们将使用scikit-learn库来加载和预处理数据，以及训练和测试分类器。目标是观察不同求解器在不同比例训练数据下的表现。

meta.title: 手写数字分类 | 性能比较 | 在线求解器
meta.description: 使用scikit-learn库探索不同在线求解器对手写数字分类的性能。预处理数据并观察不同训练数据比例下求解器的性能。
meta.keywords: 手写数字分类, 在线求解器, scikit-learn, 数据预处理, 性能比较
